description: Notifies the subscriber when new data is written to the data lake for the sources that the subscriber consumes in Security Lake. You can create only one subscriber notification per subscriber.

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: Specify the configuration using which you want to create the subscriber notification. httpsNotificationConfiguration (dict) --- The configurations used for HTTPS subscriber notification. authorizationApiKeyName (string) --- The key name for the notification subscription. authorizationApiKeyValue (string) --- The key value for the notification subscription. The subscription endpoint in Security Lake. If you prefer notification with an HTTPs endpoint, populate this field. httpMethod (string) --- The HTTPS method used for the notification subscription. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the EventBridge API destinations IAM role that you created. For more information about ARNs and how to use them in policies, see Managing data access and Amazon Web Services Managed Policies in the Amazon Security Lake User Guide. sqsNotificationConfiguration (dict) --- The configurations for SQS subscriber notification.

nested_params.name: httpsNotificationConfiguration
nested_params.description: The configurations used for HTTPS subscriber notification.

nested_params.name: authorizationApiKeyName
nested_params.description: The key name for the notification subscription.

nested_params.name: authorizationApiKeyValue
nested_params.description: The key value for the notification subscription.

nested_params.name: endpoint
nested_params.description: The subscription endpoint in Security Lake. If you prefer notification with an HTTPs endpoint, populate this field.

nested_params.name: httpMethod
nested_params.description: The HTTPS method used for the notification subscription.

nested_params.name: targetRoleArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the EventBridge API destinations IAM role that you created. For more information about ARNs and how to use them in policies, see Managing data access and Amazon Web Services Managed Policies in the Amazon Security Lake User Guide.

nested_params.name: sqsNotificationConfiguration
nested_params.description: The configurations for SQS subscriber notification.

parameters.name: subscriberId
parameters.description: The subscriber ID for the notification subscription.

nested_items.name: subscriberEndpoint
nested_items.description: The subscriber endpoint to which exception messages are posted.
